Is it the whole movie, or just part 1?

Nash was not in the least bit 'sub-normal'. As the movie shows, he was highly intelligent. He was schizophrenic. This is a psychological disorder rather than a learning disability. It does not mean or lead to reduced intelligence. If he appeared in later life to be slow, it was due to the anti-psychotic meds which have a side-effect of blunting creative genius.
@base3 yeah it was because of his Thorazine, i used to be on it myself, it makes you sorta braindead i hate the stuff.
